products.title: Woven Teal Vertical Blind
products.description: With is textured finish, this verical blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. Being simout, it will gently fileter the light entering your room when closed. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Como Alba Roller Blind
products.description: Their como range of fabrics bring a splash of colour to your home. Perfect for summer, the combination of cool grey tones with warmer yellows and oranges means this blind can be ideal for any room. Warm oranges and tonal greys connote the feelings of an italian veranda, or a sunset over a city. Como alba brings warmth with on-trend pattern to your home. products.title: Como Ocra Roller Blind
products.description: Brighten up your living space with the como ocra roller blind. The combination of cool grey tones with warmer yellows in this watercolour style motif makes for a sunny and contemporary window blind that will add a dash of colour and personality to your space. Bathrooms and kitchens will benefit from this fresh and zesty design. products.title: Boheme Pvc Blackout Azure Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Add a smart, contemporary finish to your chosen room with this appealing modern pattern. Featuring eye-catching curvaceous abstract leaves with a subtle white outline on a rich azure blue background, boheme pvc blackout azure blue double-sided blind is bound to gain many compliments. Flame retardant, this roller blind is made out of a blackout fabric, so it wont let light escape into your room, especially on a bright morning.

products.title: Amor Baby Blue Roller Blind
products.description: The light turquoise blue colour of the amor baby blue is as close to the famous colour as we can get. This is perfect for anyone wanting to add a touch of class to a room. This blind makes a great statement piece or as a match to similarly coloured furniture. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Dark Blue - Roller Blind
products.description: Pair practicality with style with the roma (fr) in dark blue, where a flame-retardant fabric, ideal for commercial buildings, forms a substantial and contemporary blind with an easy pull-cord mechanism. This distinct blend of fibers creates a crease-free blind with a neat and modern look, and in a gorgeous midnight shade. Match the vibrant and bold dark blue with a complementing and current palette of dove greys, white, and charcoal to form a stylish and modern theme.

products.title: Tiffany, Gentle - Roller Blind
products.description: A clever combination of a light cream, gently curved patterning, set on a deeper cream fine fabric background, the tiffany gentle has a pleasing homely feel and will sit subtly amidst almost any colour scheme. The tiffany gentle is a very versatile blind, and is particularly suited to more traditional dcor styles. It can provide a wonderful lightening effect in living rooms or dining rooms where darker woods and furniture might take over, or can provide a touch of modern patterning to a neutral hallway or conservatory without dominating your existing style.

products.title: Bella Blackout Tiffany Blue 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This tiffany blue vertical blind adds a soft splash of colour and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure vertical blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Bella Blackout Sapphire Blue 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: This bold bella blackout sapphire blue vertical blind brings cool-toned beautiful blue to your room. This blind reduces light through its blackout properties, making this quality made to measure vertical blind a perfect addition to any room that needs optimum light control. Whether its fully closed, binge-watching the latest riveting tv drama, or letting the light in (but keeping your privacy), their vertical blinds are great for privacy for bedroom, living room or office.

products.title: Bella Blackout Brittany Blue 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. Loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This brittany blue vertical blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories.
